snippet: ChicagoShovels.org will track the clearing of streets and encourage residents to pitch in after storms.
abstract: Chicago's new city Web site ChicagoShovels.org will provide a map of city's approximately 300 snowplows, enabling residents to track the clearing of streets in real time.
lead_paragraph: ChicagoShovels.org will track the clearing of streets and encourage residents to pitch in after storms.

headline.seo: ChicagoShovels Web Site Gives Lowdown on Snow
headline.main: Snow Site Lets Chicago See if Plows Are Really in a Rut
headline.print_headline: Snow Site Lets Chicago See If Plows Are Really in a Rut
